com.cubeia.firebase.api.mtt.support.registry
Interface PlayerRegistry

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
PlayerRegistryImpl
public interface PlayerRegistry
extends Serializable

Holds all player currently registered or participating in a tournament.

Author:
Fredrik

Method Detail

register

MttRegisterResponse register(MttInstance instance,
                             MttRegistrationRequest request)

Registers a player for this tournament.

The player will only be registered if all interceptors return MttRegisterResponse.ALLOWED.

A player has only been registered in the tournament if the return value of is MttRegisterResponse.ALLOWED

If the player is already registered he will be re-registered and all listeners will be called.

Parameters:
instance - the tournament instance
request - the context for the registration
Returns:
result of the registration

unregister

MttRegisterResponse unregister(MttInstance instance,
                               int pid)

Unregisters a player from the tournament.

The player will only be unregistered if all interceptors returns MttRegisterResponse.ALLOWED.

A player has only been unregistered in the tournament if the return value is MttRegisterResponse.ALLOW

If the player is no registered nothing will happen but all listeners will be called. To override this behavior you must provide your own interceptor(s).

Parameters:
instance - the tournament instance
pid - player id to unregister
Returns:
the result of the registration

removePlayer

void removePlayer(int pid)
Removes a player from the registry, called when a player is out of the tournament. This method will not use any interceptor or call any listeners.

Parameters:
pid - the player to remove

isRegistered

boolean isRegistered(int pid)

unregisterListener

void unregisterListener(PlayerListener listener)
Unregisters a listener from this registry.

Parameters:
listener - must not be null

void registerInterceptor(PlayerInterceptor interceptor)
Registers a PlayerInterceptor for this registry.

Parameters:
interceptor - must not be null

unregisterInterceptor

Gets all players currently contained in this registry

a Collection of MttPlayers in this registry
